item.name: $1 usage
item.description: Render Engine (Execution units, media samplers, VME and their caches) Video Encode (ENC), OpenCL, Video Scaling, VPP Composition including frame rate conversion and image stabilization, VPP copy to CPU

item.name: $1 usage
item.description: Multi-Format Codec Engine (also known as “MFX” or “VDBOX”) Video Encode (PAK) and Decode

item.name: $1 usage
item.description: 2nd instance of the MultiFormat Codec Engine, if available (Examples of supported processor include 5th generation of Intel® Core™ processors with Intel® HD Graphics 6000, Intel® Iris™ Graphics 6100, Intel® Iris™ Pro Graphics 6200, Intel® Iris™ Pro Graphics P6300) Video Encode (PAK) and Decode

item.name: $1 usage
item.description: Video Quality Engine (also known as “VEBOX” or Video Quality enhancement pipeline) Deinterlace, Denoise

trigger.expression: {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtClip1Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtClip2Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtClip3Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtClip4Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtClip5Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtClip6Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtClip7Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtClip8Status.last(0)}>0
trigger.name: Vizrt Clip Status is not ok val=1: {ITEM.VALUE1}, 2: {ITEM.VALUE2}, 3: {ITEM.VALUE3}, 4: {ITEM.VALUE4} , 5: {ITEM.VALUE5}, 6: {ITEM.VALUE6}, 7: {ITEM.VALUE7}, 8: {ITEM.VALUE8}
Vizrt Computer Type is not IRIX val={ITEM.VALUE1}
Vizrt Genlock Status is not ok val={ITEM.VALUE1}
Vizrt not Connected To DB (Graphic HUB)

trigger.expression: {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtVideoIn1Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtVideoIn2Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtVideoIn3Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtVideoIn4Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtVideoIn5Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtVideoIn6Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtVideoIn7Status.last(0)}>0 or {Template Vizrt SNMP:VizrtVideoIn8Status.last(0)}>0
trigger.name: Vizrt Video In Status is not ok val=1: {ITEM.VALUE1}, 2: {ITEM.VALUE2}, 3: {ITEM.VALUE3}, 4: {ITEM.VALUE4} , 5: {ITEM.VALUE5}, 6: {ITEM.VALUE6}, 7: {ITEM.VALUE7}, 8: {ITEM.VALUE8}
